statements: UPDATE blockchain_signatures SET transaction_hash = 'abcdef123456', block_number = 100 WHERE signature_id = 1;

UPDATE blockchain_signatures SET transaction_hash = '0xABCDEF', timestamp = current_timestamp WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE signature_keys SET private_key = '\x12345' WHERE key_id = 2;
UPDATE blockchain_transactions SET transaction_data = '{"amount": 500, "recipient": "Alice"}', digital_signature = E'\xDEADBEEF' WHERE transaction_id = '96a1f70e-1dd5-4d4f-8aa1-1ef156b13a31';
UPDATE signature_metadata SET signer_name = 'Bob', signing_timestamp = '2022-10-15 08:30:00' WHERE transaction_id = '96a1f70e-1dd5-4d4f-8aa1-1ef156b13a31';
UPDATE blockchain_transactions SET digital_signature = E'\\xDEADBEEF' WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
